article.title: Top 10 Instagram-Worthy Spots In Bali To Get The Best Aesthetic Feed
article.lead_paragraph: Tropical haven Bali isn‚Äôt just pretty when you see it with your own eyes, but it is pretty in pictures too. From the endless collections of seascapes, landscapes, colourful cafes and unique boutiques, this photogenic paradise will make you want to whip out your phone and snap a picture quicker than you can say the word 'Bali'. Whether you are the Queen of OOTDs and selfies or the pro snapper, Bali is the place to be. Immerse yourself in the local Balinese culture and explore these Instgaram-worthy sights - the road to an aesthetic feed has just begun.
article.meta_description: Discover the top 10 aesthetic sights in Bali in order to achieve an aesthetic Instagram feed.

snippets.text:
> #### **Shoot My Travel**
>
>**Looking for a unique experience? [Shoot My Travel](https://www.shootmytravel.com?trip101_button=false) is a service where a photographer takes you around Bali's top spots while taking candid photos of you. It's easy: simply select your destination, choose a photographer, and pick a package. You'll receive the photos 24-48 hours after the shoot!**
>
> [Shoot My Travel](https://www.shootmytravel.com/bali-photographers)
1. Hanging Gardens Infinity Pool

snippets.html:
I dodged a few flighty birds and took a few shots of the @hanginggardensofbali today! Hehe fun #luxury #bestinbali

A photo posted by @aliquid.novi on Nov 1, 2016 at 1:49am PDT

snippets.text: This stunning double level infinity pool has been crowned 'One of Bali's Best Swimming Pools in the World' by style bible Cond√© Nast Traveler, and we sure can see why.

snippets.html:
Happy honeymoon! #bali #welcometothejungle

A photo posted by Kristina Alldrin (@kristinaalldrin) on Oct 22, 2016 at 5:39pm PDT

snippets.text: Designed by an architect, experience nature like you've never done before by floating on the calm clear waters, the dense rainforest in the background just within your reach.

snippets.html:
After 30 hours of traveling and a 15 hour time difference, this view from our room was totally worth it. #hanginggardensofbali #honeymoon #bali #jojolattaloveinbali

A photo posted by Jocelyn Sanchez Jojola (@jocelynbsanchez) on Nov 1, 2016 at 4:22pm PDT

snippets.text: Whether it is a back view, front view, top angle or low, there is no doubt that the pictures will still come out as breathtaking as ever, because what can beat being on a levitated pool in the middle of a scenic rainforest?

> #### Hanging Gardens Infinity Pool 
>
> **Address**: Banjar Susut, Desa Buahan, Payangan, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: Different prices depending on the date of check-in. Check the website for more details 
>
> **Opening Hours**:  9am - 6pm. Closed on public holidays.
>
> **Contact**: +62 361 982700
>
> **Website**: [Hanging Gardens Infinity Pool](https://hanginggardensofbali.com/)
2. Nusa Penida

snippets.html:
Spending my halloween weekend in this island. Nusa Penida was breathtaking and this is just one of the many beautiful spots! Thank you @nusapenida_travellers @nusapenida.discovery üíô #FlyPAL #kattgoesaway

A photo posted by KATT VALDEZ (@kattvaldez) on Oct 29, 2016 at 10:32pm PDT

snippets.text: Also known as the Maldives of Bali, pay a visit to Nusa Penida, the largest of the three south-eastern islands of the coast of  Bali.

snippets.html:
Nusa Penida is like Coron and Batanes combined. And I'm not even kidding! Watch @avelovin's latest YouTube video so you could agree ‚ù§Ô∏èüëåüèº #kattgoesaway

A photo posted by KATT VALDEZ (@kattvaldez) on Nov 2, 2016 at 5:05am PDT

snippets.text: Away from the mainstream crowds and commercial ways of Bali, Nusa Penida is generally quieter and much more peaceful. This picturesque haven contains one of the most photogenic beaches and the most breathtaking views that will definitely leave your followers wanting more.

snippets.html:
Stay afloat üå¨üòÖ today's Nusa Penida adventure on my Snapchat- kattvaldez üåä #bali #kattgoesaway (üì∑: @ashleyyeee_)

A photo posted by KATT VALDEZ (@kattvaldez) on Oct 30, 2016 at 5:15am PDT

snippets.text: Many wonder what the true definition of 'aesthetic' means. Well, we hope this picture successfully puts all your doubts to rest.

> #### Nusa Penida
>
> **Address**: Nusa Penida
>
> **Price**: A ticket for the daily public ferry from Padang Bai is 2.36 USD each 
>
> **Opening Hours**:  Ferry leaves everyday at 1pm 
>
> **Website**: [Nusa Penida](http://wikitravel.org/en/Nusa_Penida)
3. Tengenungan Waterfall

snippets.html:
This view KILLS MA SOul

A photo posted by @melissayurt on Nov 1, 2016 at 10:50pm PDT

snippets.text: Apart from the pristine sandy beaches and the unforgettable sunset by the sea, many people forget that Bali contains the most beautiful waterfalls and crystal clear swimming holes.

snippets.html:
They said you shouldn't go chasing waterfalls.. üòçüåà

A photo posted by Louise Anderson üëë (@louiseanderson__) on Feb 16, 2016 at 8:02pm PST

snippets.text: Probably one of the ultimate favourite tourist waterfall spots in Bali, Tengenungan Waterfall is the go-to place if you would like to flaunt a little of that beach body you have been hiding, and have a stunning gush of water running down as your aesthetic background.

snippets.html:
Following the signs üåà

A photo posted by Laura Reid (@laurareidd) on Nov 4, 2016 at 10:51pm PDT

snippets.text: An OOTD beside the famous signboard of Tengenungan Waterfall works too if you don't feel like heading into the water.

> #### Tengenungan Waterfall
>
> **Address**: Jalan Ir. Sutami, Kemenuh, Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Opening Hours**: Open daily 
>
> **Access**: 30 minutes from Ubud
>
> **Contact**: +62 857-3781-8549
4. Tanah Lot Temple

snippets.html:
Could have actually went up to the temple in the picture if the tide wasn't high but it was beautiful nonetheless üíØ

A photo posted by Cassandra Chan (@casschxn) on Apr 7, 2016 at 10:47pm PDT

snippets.text: The overwhelming beauty and serenity of Tanah Lot is mesmerising. This delicate and historic temple is located right on top of a 3-acre (1.2 hectare) rock, at a few minutes' walk up from the coastal lip. However, do note that only Balinese people are allowed to enter. Tourists are still free to view and photograph the unique off-shore settings and sunset backdrop.

snippets.html:
Mornings at the gate üåæ #FlyPAL @FlyPAL Photo by: @kamabtara #kattgoesaway

A photo posted by KATT VALDEZ (@kattvaldez) on Nov 3, 2016 at 7:55pm PDT

snippets.text: Enter the splendid gates of the temple, but not without a full body shot of you entering this prestige site.

snippets.html:
‚ÄúWe are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.‚Äù ‚Äì Buddha üôèüèº Sunset at Tanah Lot, Bali üåÖ #Buddha #quote #happiness #joy #thebaliguideline #balidaily #bestinbali #balicili #baligasm #balifitnessescape #balifeature

A photo posted by Katrina Blakeney ‚Ä† (@_mz_fancypantz_) on Sep 27, 2016 at 9:24pm PDT

snippets.text: The beautiful sunsets in Tanah Lot are to die-for. Keep track of the magic hour and get ready for a fancy pose, the glorious colours of the setting sun are worth capturing!

> #### Tanah Lot Temple 
>
> **Address**: Bali 82171, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: Tourist (Adult): 2.30 USD, Tourist (Child 6-12 years old): 4.60 USD 
>
> **Opening Hours**:  7am - 7pm daily 
>
> **Access**: 20km (12 miles) north-west of Kuta
>
> **Contact**:  +62 361 880361
>
>**Website**: [Tanah Lot Temple](http://www.tanahlot.net/home/)
5. La Laguna Bali

snippets.html:
Sunsets... Cocktails... Company.... Convo.. And a 'peacefully' perfect place... Life üëåüèºüçç #Happy #LaLaguna #Bali #Canngu @lalaguna @thebalibible

A photo posted by üåé ROZE COOK üåπ (@roze_cook) on Nov 1, 2016 at 7:08pm PDT

snippets.text: If you have heard of the hipster bar La Favela, you would not want to miss La Laguna! This beach club cum restaurant is brought to you by the same eccentric and charming folks.

snippets.html: A post shared by LA LAGUNA BALI (@lalagunabali) on Oct 28, 2017 at 1:14am PDT

snippets.text: Get into your inner gypsy and enjoy the vintage decor that lines La Laguna! Pose with the gypsy caverns that look like they might have came straight out of a storybook - their efforts in making this place magical have definitely paid off.

snippets.html: A post shared by LA LAGUNA BALI (@lalagunabali) on Oct 23, 2017 at 1:28am PDT

snippets.text: The trick is finding this magical place and not getting lost - it is located very deep and can get confusing if you are unfamiliar with the place! Here's our special advice: it is easier from the Berawa beach. Find it halfway between Batu Belig and Berawa Beach and walk over the big wooden bridge. All successful adventurers will tend to take a victory OOTD of them entering La Laguna, so don't miss out on that too!

> #### La Laguna Bali 
>
> **Address**: Jalan Pantai Kayu Putih, Berawa, Canggu, Bali, 80361, Indonesia
>
> **Opening Hours**:  11am - 12am daily 
>
> **Access**: 10 minutes' walk from Jalan Batu Belig
>
> **Contact**: +62 812-3638-2272
>
> **Website**: [La Laguna Bali](https://www.facebook.com/lalagunabali/)
6. Old Man‚Äôs Bali

snippets.html:
üíôüíõüíôüíõüíôüíõ . „ÅÇ„Å£„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÈñì„ÅÆ1„ÉµÊúàüôå ÊòéÊó•„ÇéBaliÊúÄÁµÇÊó•üò≠ . ÊúÄÂæå„Å´„Çµ„Éº„Éï„Ç£„É≥„Åô„ÇãüåäüåäüèÑüåäüåä . „ÇÑ„Å£„Å±„ÇäÊµ∑„ÅåÂ§ßÂ•Ω„Åçüíôüíôüíô . #„Éê„É™Â≥∂#Bali#„Éê„É™#Indonesia#„Ç§„É≥„Éâ„Éç„Ç∑„Ç¢#oldMan#DEUS#„ÉÅ„É£„É≥„Ç∞„Éº#canggu#BINTANG#üçª#„Çµ„Éº„Éï„Ç£„É≥#surfTime#‚òÄÔ∏è#üíô #SURFgirl#SURF#beach#happy#GENIC#genic_mag#genic_sunset #genic_beach#English#Englishschool#„ÅîË§íÁæé#‚úà#„Éó„ÉÅÁïôÂ≠¶ #„Çø„Éì„Ç∏„Éß#„Ç´„É°„É©Â•≥Â≠ê

A photo posted by mimi___1121 (@mimi___1121) on Nov 5, 2016 at 11:00am PDT

snippets.text: This chilled beachfront beer garden is the perfect hangout spot whether it is day or night. Be charmed by the friendly and laid-back atmosphere, and get ready for a relaxing good time.

snippets.html:
. . Gm‚òÄÔ∏è„ÇÑ„Å£„Å®ÈáëÊõúÊó•üò¨üôåüèæ . . #bali#indonesia#oldmans#twins #surf#beach#sea#summer #oldmansbali#love#cafe#gm #„Éê„É™#„Ç™„Éº„É´„Éâ„Éû„É≥„Ç∫#Â£Å #code#twinscode#polo#cap#gyda #ÂèØÊÑõ„Åô„Åé#„ÅäÊ¥íËêΩ„Åô„Åé#m10 #„Åæ„ÅüË°å„Åç„Åü„ÅÑ#Áú†„Åü„ÅÑ#canon#canon_eosm

A photo posted by Haruka (@h_a_r_u05) on May 12, 2016 at 3:16pm PDT

snippets.text: The chilled atmosphere and drinks aside, Old Man's is also a popular OOTD spot due to its fancy and vibrant doodled wall.

snippets.html:
¬øC√≥mo no pensarte? Si tus ojos se pintan en los atardeceres. ¬∞‚Ä¢‚ñ™ ‚ñ™‚Ä¢¬∞ #bali#canggu#indonesialoving#hope#peace#sunsets

A post shared by Shirley Marie (@shir_iam) on Feb 6, 2018 at 4:32am PST

snippets.text: A good hangout spot: checked. Affordable prices: checked. Nice background for an aesthetic shot: checked!

> #### Old Man's Bali 
>
> **Address**: Jl. Pantai Batu Bolong, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Opening Hours**:  7am - 9pm daily 
>
> **Contact**: + 62 361 8469 158
>
> **Website**: [Old Man's Bali](https://oldmans.net/)
7. Finn‚Äôs Beach Club

snippets.html:
Give me some house music & some Sunshine üåûüíõ #bali #finnsbeachclub @finnsbeachclub

A photo posted by Patrick (@patrickdossantosaveiro) on Nov 8, 2016 at 9:05am PST

snippets.text: Laze the day away while being half immersed in the stunning 30-metre (98 feet) infinity pool. Bob your head to the pumping music from the underwater speakers, Finn's Beach Club has everything you need to experience more of paradise Bali.

snippets.html:
In Bali we do yoga every morning üêíüåæ #Uluwatu #Bali @finnsbeachclub

A photo posted by JULIE NERVIK (@jnervik) on Mar 28, 2016 at 7:15am PDT

snippets.text: A bikini-clad OOTD on the aesthetic white sand beaches is more than enough - but if you are feeling a bit more adventurous -  a Yoga pose will do just the trick too.

snippets.html:
–í –ª—é–±–æ–π –Ω–µ–ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Å–∏—Ç—É–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏–¥–∏ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞–∫–∞—Çüíïüôå

A photo posted by A L E X I L Y I N A (@uh_alex_alex) on Nov 4, 2016 at 3:55am PDT

snippets.text: Say goodbye to the sun as it slowly sets, and admire the majestic view of stunning Bali. With the glimmering glow of the lanterns against the lavender sky, who can resist not snapping a picture?

> #### Finn's Beach Club 
>
> **Address**: Jalan Raya Pantai Berawa, Tibubeneng, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: Free entry for all areas
>
> **Opening Hours**:  10am - 11pm daily 
>
> **Contact**:  +62 361 8446327
>
> **Website**: [Finn's Beach Club](http://www.finnsbeachclub.com/)
8. The Dusty Cafe

snippets.html: A post shared by THE DUSTY CAFE (@dustycafe) on Nov 7, 2017 at 10:55pm PST

snippets.text: Despite being one of the smallest cafes in Bali, this newly opened hipster cafe is quite popular and has been receiving good feedback from its customers.

snippets.html:
–î–æ–±—Ä–æ–µ —É—Ç—Ä–æüê£ –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–æ –Ω–∞—á–∞—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ —Å –≤–∫—É—Å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∑–∞–≤—Ç—Ä–∞–∫–∞!) —ç—Ç–æ—Ç –º–æ–π –ª—é–±–∏–º—ã–πüíî —è–π—Ü–∞ –ø–∞—à–æ—Ç –Ω–∞ —Ç–æ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –ª–æ—Å–æ—Å–µ–ºüòç –∞ –∫–∞–∫–æ–π –≤–∞—à –ª—é–±–∏–º—ã–π –∑–∞–≤—Ç—Ä–∞–∫?)

A photo posted by Margarita (@sl_rita) on Aug 18, 2016 at 10:14pm PDT

snippets.text: Dusty generally serves a small menu of healthy colourful food. Enjoy these tasty but healthy foods and snap a few for the 'food porn' section of your feed.

snippets.html:
What I had for breakfast. #fruit #fresh #yoga #bali #seminyak #breakfastbowl #brekkie

A photo posted by ceciel (@siselm) on Oct 12, 2016 at 2:18am PDT

snippets.text: Also a killer are the delicate and freshly cut smoothie bowls, a mix of vibrant and cheerful colours all in one hearty meal.

> #### The Dusty Cafe 
>
> **Address**:  Jalan Camplung Tanduk No. 4, Kuta, Bali 80361, Indonesia
>
>**Price**: main courses from 4.50 USD 
>
> **Opening Hours**:  9am - 10.45pm daily 
>
> **Contact**: +62 (0) 8 21 46 45 20 51
>
> **Website**: [The Dusty Cafe](https://www.facebook.com/The-Dusty-Cafe-803658299666204/)
9. Bali Boat Shed

snippets.html:
Summer clothes all year üòç

A photo posted by KATT VALDEZ (@kattvaldez) on Nov 6, 2016 at 1:14am PDT

snippets.text: Now that you are experiencing the island life, it is a must to dress like an islander too! The bright and colourful interiors of Bali Boat Shed are always inviting, so step into fashion galore to see what else Bali has in store for you!

snippets.html:
Details details details. So happy I have an equal in my life who loves walking the streets of new countries as much as I do.

A photo posted by Fiona + Bobby Photography (@fionaandbobby) on Aug 21, 2015 at 9:02am PDT

snippets.text: This vibrant store sells both male and female outfits, so feel free to drag in your dad/brother or boyfriend if they insist on standing outside. The multi-coloured shack houses are not only quirky for an OOTD or candid shot, but also interesting if you play with various angles.

snippets.html:
ICE CREAM. I SCREAM üç¶üåàüçâüçìüçß @baliboatshed stopped by the most colourful little store in Bali to grab this cute summery combo... And it still fits with my standard uniform of white tees and denim bottoms üôä If you are in Bali you must come check this shop out. I also got these bad ass @ksubi glasses from here #ShredThreads

A photo posted by F R A N ‚ö°D O L L (@throughrosecolouredglasses) on Aug 19, 2015 at 9:47pm PDT

snippets.text: Apart from the colourful walls, a small bench can also be found right outside the shop. Sitting on the bench for a picture is way too mainstream we find, so how about standing beside it with a casual pose?

> #### Bali Boat Shed 
>
> **Address**: Jl. Laksamana Basangkasa No.55, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
>
>**Price**: Outfits from 10 USD 
>
> **Opening Hours**:  10am - 8pm daily 
>
> **Contact**:  +62 856 5933 1907
>
> **Website**: [Bali Boat Shed](http://baliboatshed.com/)
10. Motel Mexicola

snippets.html:
To the left, to the left üö∂üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

A photo posted by Jessica Kurniawan (@jeskurniawan) on Nov 1, 2016 at 6:45am PDT

snippets.text: Colourful and quirky Motel Mexicola is a Mexican bar and restaurant you should visit if you would like to see some neon lights and unique architecture on your feed.

snippets.html:
The interior of #MotelMexicola absolutely blew my mind üòç already missing Bali...but starting that photo spam üôäüì∑

A photo posted by ‚úåüèºÔ∏è Karlee (@derpdork) on Nov 5, 2016 at 3:12am PDT

snippets.text: It gets more happening at night, as customers are allowed to rave to the thump-stopping music under the neon lights and (to us) scary decorations. Take a gothic picture behind all the darkness and lights, it's not every time you get to visit such a cool motel.

snippets.html:
Motel Mexicola, you were a dream come true! #Bali

A photo posted by Melody (@meowiie) on Nov 9, 2016 at 4:07am PST

snippets.text: Still, none can deny the stunning interior of Motel Mexicola. If you are the kind to enjoy capturing the minor details in every picture, Motel Mexicola during the day with a cold coconut will do just fine.

> #### Motel Mexicola 
>
> **Address**: Jalan Kayu Jati No. 9X, Seminyak, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
>
>**Price**: Spirits from 6 USD 
>
> **Opening Hours**:  11am - 1am daily 
>
> **Contact**: +62 361 736688
>
> **Website**: [Motel Mexicola](http://www.motelmexicolabali.com/)
#paradise

And as much as we love to go on, we can't because then the list will never stop. Life in Bali is beauty in every corner, and it is really a shame if a photo is not taken to commemorate how stunning and gorgeous this tropical haven is. It is not wrong to hashtag 'paradise' for every picture that is related to Bali, for if Bali isn't paradise we don't know what is.

article.nearest_airport_html: Denpasar, Indonesia (DPS-Ngurah Rai Intl.) - DPS Edit Airport || Edit Region

lead_paragraph_embed.value: Tropical haven Bali isn‚Äôt just pretty when you see it with your own eyes, but it is pretty in pictures too. From the endless collections of seascapes, landscapes, colourful cafes and unique boutiques, this photogenic paradise will make you want to whip out your phone and snap a picture quicker than you can say the word 'Bali'. Whether you are the Queen of OOTDs and selfies or the pro snapper, Bali is the place to be. Immerse yourself in the local Balinese culture and explore these Instgaram-worthy sights - the road to an aesthetic feed has just begun.

navigator.introduction: Clara likes to spend her time daydreaming about countries she has never visited before, and while she is at it,  exploring new cafes and cool spots in Singapore. She is passionate about reading and writing, and has a special thing for literature classics.
